org.jogger
Class AbstractJoggerServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.jogger.AbstractJoggerServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
JoggerServlet, MockJoggerServlet
public abstract class AbstractJoggerServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

This is a base class for the JoggerServlet and the MockJoggerServlet. It basically provides all the logic to service requests using the Servlet API.

Author:
German Escobar
See Also:

getRoutes

protected abstract Routes getRoutes()
                             throws ParseException,
                                    RoutesException
Must return the routes that the Servlet will use to map requests.

Returns:
a ready to use Routes implementation.
Throws:
ParseException - if there is a problem parsing the routes file.
RoutesException - if there is any other problem loading the routes.

getFreeMarkerConfig

protected abstract freemarker.template.Configuration getFreeMarkerConfig()
                                                                  throws ConfigurationException
Must return the FreeMarker configuration that the Servlet will use to render templates.

Returns:
the FreeMarker Configuration object.
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if there is a problem creating the Configuration object.

getInterceptors

protected abstract Interceptors getInterceptors()
                                         throws ConfigurationException
Must return the interceptors that the Servlet will use to intercept requests.

Returns:
an initialized Interceptors implementation.
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if there is a problem creating the Interceptors implementation.
